details.title: Axiom - Design Library - React, Next, Storybook
points: Collaborated on Axiom, an open-source design library for standardized UI/UX across Optimizely products.
Developed and integrated reusable components to ensure consistency and scalability.
Worked closely with cross-functional teams to align Axiom with product goals.

details.title: Content Marketing Platform - Enterprise SaaS tool
points: Built features and reviewed TypeScript code for CMP which is used by companies such as Shell and Xerox.

details.title: Attendance Management System
points: Created custom graphs and filters to enhance data analysis and reporting.

details.title: Automated Trading System
points: Developed a TradeStation API for real-time stock data; built and deployed the project on Azure using .NET.
